mapper.sql: ip, port, type, available, lag, fetch_time, verify_time, invalid_times, discarded
mapper.insert:
insert into pip_proxy_ip
ip,
port,
type,
available,
lag,
fetch_time,
verify_time,
invalid_times,
discarded,
#{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{port,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{available,jdbcType=BIT},
#{lag,jdbcType=REAL},

mapper.update:
update pip_proxy_ip
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
available = #{available,jdbcType=BIT},
lag = #{lag,jdbcType=REAL},
fetch_time = #{fetchTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
verify_time = #{verifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
invalid_times = #{invalidTimes,jdbcType=BIT},
discarded = #{discarded,jdbcType=BIT},
where ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and port = #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER}
